# @nareshkosal/workos-authkit

Next.js App Router routes, middleware, header, and context for WorkOS AuthKit.

## Installation

```bash
# Using npm
npx @nareshkosal/workos-authkit

# Using pnpm
pnpm dlx @nareshkosal/workos-authkit

# Using yarn
yarn dlx @nareshkosal/workos-authkit
```
